#The Jquery file isn't downloaded into this file, it is linked to "https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.2/jquery.min.js"

#Bootstrap file isn't downloaded to run locally in this file, it is linked to "http://s3.amazonaws.com/codecademy-content/courses/ltp2/css/bootstrap.min.css"

#There are a few button icons for the carousel (the dots are generated by the Html built-in &bull;) of slides are borrowed off from "http://s3.amazonaws.com/codecademy-content/courses/ltp2/img/flipboard/arrow-prev.png"


!So the web page needs to be able to run with the internet connected or else it won't be the
same way that it's ment to be presented.
